titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mr. Wilhelm Schlechter, Mrs. Monica Pino Schlechter, Ingrid Daniela Schlechter, and Arturo David Schlechter.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 3/2/1988--Introduced. Declares four named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
